title: Welcome to MAPPS@Brown
text:
Privacy and Ethics in Pandemic Data Collection and Processing
January 17–20, 2023 Providence, RI
This website will house materials related to the Center for Mobility Analysis for Pandemic Prevention Strategies (MAPPS) 2023 workshop entitled “Privacy and Ethic in Pandemic Data Collection and Processing”.
We will host workshop guides, session briefs, and summary documents here so that MAPPS participants can download these files throughout the week.
